name: Extramural R&D and R&D plant by type of agreement, by agency: FY 2021
description: Extramural R&D and R&D plant by type of agreement, by agency: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_total_r_d_and_r_d_plant_contracts
variableMeasured.description: Total R D And R D Plant Contracts

variableMeasured.name: field_total_r_d_and_r_d_plant_grants
variableMeasured.description: Total R D And R D Plant Grants

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. Only those agencies and subdivisions that had obligations in variables represented by this table appear in the table. FY 2021 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19 pandemic-related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act). See technical table A-2 for additional notes associated with the agencies listed in this table.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2021–22.
